ygData.subject: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: At last some of more interesting items can be present at 2 or more places i hate to go to camp 3 days .. 70 online hours for jboots in najena it is horible!!
ygData.messageBody:
At last some of more interesting items can be present at 2 or more places i
hate to go to camp 3 days .. 70 online hours for jboots in najena it is
horible!!


At 20.48 08/09/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
>**snip**
>>meet many ppl willing to sell there hard earned items for gold.
>>Verrant are fools who think they shuld keep the number of items down, >and
>>with
>>making them lore item and no drop. if this keeps up ill go play AC
>> >instead.
>>/Askur Wizard of Veeshan
>
>I have to agree with you there Askur. I can understand why Verrant made
>things hard to get and rare... but the current method tends to encourage a
>lot of the parts of the game that is NOT fun. (ie camping, hording for
>guildmembers, etc.)
>
>I can't offer a solution...would it be a better game if Verrant made it so
>every NPC *guaranteed* that you'll get the item you wanted? Or if they made
>things spawn faster so everyone has a chance to kill it? I'm divided....
>
>-- Lim'Dul
